d = {'a': 1, 'b': 2}
# pickle
import pickle
d_str = pickle.dumps(d)
pickle.dump(d, file_obj)  # save to file
_d = pickle.loads(d_str)
_d = pickle.load(file_obj)  # load from file
# json
import json
